onBoardingDescriptionOne: Use your fingerprint for secure and effortless check-in and check-out.
onBoardingDescriptionTwo: Capture a personal photo at check-in to ensure identity verification.
onBoardingDescriptionThree: Easily submit and track your leave requests directly through the app.
